author.bio: I play video games & I have cats!
author.bio_html: I play video games & I have cats!

guild.description:
Ask and answer questions.

Rules:

🤔 Posts must be questions. This is a community dedicated to Q&A discussion, so post titles must be in the form of a question.

⁉️ No loaded questions.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

🥾 Breaking these rules will result in posts being kicked and possibly an exile.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

title: Ruqqus, what advice would you give to your past self?

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: "Don't count on doing much of anything amazing just because people tell you you're smart. You unfortunately don't have enough of the natural talent that the ones who succeed do."
body_html: "Don't count on doing much of anything amazing just because people tell you you're smart. You unfortunately don't have enough of the natural talent that the ones who succeed do."

post.title: Ruqqus, what advice would you give to your past self?

body: Treat the current women in your life better. Discover the jewish question earlier. Pay more attenion in highschool and dont take drugs to escape reality. Forge better friendships and hopefully try to steer some of your friends on a better path. Dont let shawn ruin his life like he did in high school.
body_html: Treat the current women in your life better. Discover the jewish question earlier. Pay more attenion in highschool and dont take drugs to escape reality. Forge better friendships and hopefully try to steer some of your friends on a better path. Dont let shawn ruin his life like he did in high school.

post.title: Ruqqus, what advice would you give to your past self?

body:
detach from stressful situations

dont judge books by cover

be proud of your blackness

be proud of your jewishness
body_html:
detach from stressful situations

dont judge books by cover

be proud of your blackness

be proud of your jewishness

post.title: Ruqqus, what advice would you give to your past self?

body:
What I would tell my younger self: No adult has ever said the body starts declining after 35. You only got from 15-35 to really do stuff, after that youll do less and less.

Nothing else needs to be said.
body_html:
What I would tell my younger self: No adult has ever said the body starts declining after 35. You only got from 15-35 to really do stuff, after that youll do less and less.

Nothing else needs to be said.

post.title: Ruqqus, what advice would you give to your past self?

author.bio: Former Hells Angel, ex-carny, briefly a merc, and now retired....but still raising enough hell to get booted from Reddit, and banned from Facebook without ever joining.
author.bio_html: Former Hells Angel, ex-carny, briefly a merc, and now retired....but still raising enough hell to get booted from Reddit, and banned from Facebook without ever joining.

body: Don't move anywhere near a big city, and stay clear of Commifornia.
body_html: Don't move anywhere near a big city, and stay clear of Commifornia.
